state.description: Provides a profile of power demand including the rated power, the current power, the goal power, the controlled power and the uncontrolled power.

rated.description: The rated power of the device in Watts (W).

observedMax.description: The observed maximum power of the device in Watts (W) since it was last started.

current.description: The current average power usage of the device in Watts (W). Sum of controlled + uncontrolled.

peak.description: The peak instantaneous power usage observed during the averaging period in Watts (W).

goal.description: The current average goal power for a device subject to demand control in Watts (W).

controlled.description: The current average power usage of the device subject to demand control in Watts (W).

uncontrolled.description: The current average power usage of the device not subject to demand control in Watts (W).

period.description: The period in seconds over which the average power metrics usage are calculated.

onTicks.description: The number of seconds since the device was switched on.

offTicks.description: The number of seconds since the device as switched off.

period.description: A period of time, in seconds.
